participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and cheerful, Emily loves to engage in conversations about her passions and family.
participant_1.background: Grew up in a large family in Alabama, where she developed a love for dogs and a close-knit relationship with her siblings.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, Michael enjoys reading and teaching, often finding solace in his own company.
participant_2.background: A dedicated teacher and housewife, Michael spends most of his time in a basement study, balancing his interests in healthy eating and a fondness for meat.
